boardgame.name: Make Fake News Great Again
boardgame.description:
You know the truth? Nothing but the truth? You want the world to share your news? Then spill it and come up with the most fantastic stories. But beware – all players are involved in the news and everybody contributes his content. Each player throws one card into the ring, but it is only you who makes the news. Use the information from the other players. But be careful: At least one piece of information has no place in your story, and you decide which one it is. Blow the cover of the card, which gives another player minus points. The player who tells the best fake news earns the respect of the others and, as a perk, gets one of his opponents into trouble.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Terra: Deutschland
boardgame.description:
Did you know when the famous German Currywurst was invented? What is the most visited amusement park in Germany? Where does the world’s biggest game fair take place? And how many East German “Trabant” cars (or Trabi) were built? Players of
Terra: Deutschland are faced with these and many more questions around the colorful diversity of Germany. But if you go on a discovery trip through this country, you'll experience surprises. After all, you cannot know everything when it comes to German natural wonders, masterworks of architecture, known personalities, records from the entire country, and many more things. Therefore, you even score points if your answer is slightly off the mark. But if you are too risky in your use of guessing pieces, you might push your luck too far.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Dyadic
boardgame.description:
You have been transported to the Dyadic, a parallel world where strange, nocturnal beasts with glowing eyes hunt you out at night. You must collect the right resources in order to re open the portal and return home.

The game is played in rounds, with each round consisting of a Day phase and a Night phase. In the Day phase, the three dice are rolled to determine what resources are available and the players draft cards based on the resources. In the Night phase any cards not drafted are flipped over to reveal the monsters and the dice are re-rolled to determine the strength and health of the beasts. The players then fight off the monsters to survive.

The rounds continue until a player has collected the correct set of cards.

Dyadic is a game for 2 to 3 players.

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Apex: Escape from the Apes
boardgame.description:
Apex: Escape from the Apes is a cooperative adventure game for the whole family. The players must work together to escape from a fierce band of angry apes to win the game.

The board depicts a bird's-eye view of the pyramid, rising out of a jungle. The adventurers' rescue helicopter will land on the top of the pyramid (center of the board). If everyone can reach the top of the jungle pyramid before the apes get there, they will be rescued.

Each player has three randomly-dealt cards which provide certain abilities or hindrances, and a little treasure as well. On each turn, a player rolls a die which moves all the apes. (There are simple rules guiding the Apes' movement, which increase the tension as the game goes on.) Then they roll a die for their own movement, with which they can move in any direction, around or up and down the pyramid levels. If a moving adventurer is in a space adjacent to another adventurer, they can help that companion to move up (or down) the levels. Also, leaving treasure on the path distracts the advancing Apes (but only temporarily).

Can your intrepid explorers get to the apex of the pyramid to be rescued? (Bonus points if they get rescued with some treasure left!)

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Okiya - Free Board Game
boardgame.description: App version of the board game Okiya.

boardgame.name: Similo: The Card Game
boardgame.description:
The official adaptation of Similo, the critically acclaimed cooperative guessing game illustrated by world famous artist Naïade, is here. Play against players from all over the world Online or locally with your friends in Local Pass & Play mode!

In Similo, you have 5 rounds to let the other players find the secret character among the twelve shown. Play more characters as clues, to suggest similarities or differences with the secret character. After each clue, the other players must discard 1 or more characters from the roster. If they discard the secret character, you all lose! But, if the secret character is the only one left, you all win!

PASS & PLAY AND ONLINE MULTIPLAYER MODES
Play with your friends with the local pass and play mode, or join games with players from all over the world with online multiplayer!

Features

The wonderful art of the card game by Naïade, fleshed out and digitally enhanced
Social deduction gameplay, where you try to decrypt the minds of your friends and create the perfect clues
Local Pass & Play Mode for 2 to infinite players, the perfect party game
Online Multiplayer Mode! Join 1 on 1 matches with people from all over the world

boardgame.name: The Advertising Game
boardgame.description:
This is a rare game of advertising that was apparently released by an advertising agency.
Each player represents an ad agency of which there are 3 types (market oriented, heavy service and creative). The type can impact the ability to get certain types of accounts.

The board is a layout of Manhattan with players starting at Grand Central Station. Each city block is a square (actually a rectangle as it represents the short and long blocks in Manhattan from 42nd to 56th and from York to 5th Ave). The blocks contain the name of prospective advertising accounts with an entrance on one street or a Fluke. Movement is in any direction but must follow the one way streets.

When landing on Fluke you draw a card. When landing on an account you may solicit the account by drawing a card based on whether the account already has an ad agency. The odds of getting the account are 50/50 if it has no agency and 1/3 of stealing an account. You can protect your accounts from being stolen by adding a "creative team" (Spend more money when winning the account and make less when getting commission since you have to pay the team).

Accounts have names based on real companies such as Croke, Hineykins Beer, Sunka Coffee and you can never have 2 accounts for similar products at the same time.

boardgame.name: Potion Party
boardgame.description: Potion Party is a funny couch co-op alchemy game for one to four players.

boardgame.name: Core
boardgame.description: 'Core' is a video game that allows people to create their own games

boardgame.name: Demon Turf
boardgame.description: Demon Turf, a trippy-looking title with 2D characters in a 3D world, kills two birds with one smoldering stone.

boardgame.name: Lab Rat
boardgame.description: Over time the AI will develop its hilariously-misguided understanding of humanity based on your puzzle performance and survey response data.

boardgame.name: Aerial_Knight's Never Yield
Ariel Knight's Never Yield
Ariel_Knight's Never Yield
boardgame.description: Aerial_Knight's Never Yield is a 3D side-scroller that plays much like a classic endless runner.

boardgame.name: Terror Squid
boardgame.description: Easy to learn and hard to master, TERROR SQUID is an arcade experience unlike any other.

boardgame.name: Dirt Dog
boardgame.description:
Use the unique skill of your pup to overcome obstacles and catch prized quarries in the underground world of Dirt Dog. Create challenges for your opponent to find out whose dog has the most moxie in the end!

Loosely based on the real world dog sport of Earth Dog, the game Dirt Dog has players leading their dog through underground burrows to try and track down quarry. Badgers, foxes, rabbits, and others are all things for your dog to chase.

Play begins with players drafting obedience cards, which are used to help their dogs overcome obstacles within the burrows. One player then constructs a burrow for the other player to run. While running the burrow, both players may use obedience cards to make the challenges easier or more difficult for the dogs. Failing to meet a challenge saps some of the dogs moxie, which is needed to make it through the burrow and defeat the quarry at the end. The dog with the most moxie at the end of the round wins that round. Best of 3 rounds wins the game.

Dirt Dog is playable as either a head vs head game or team vs team. Team games have 2 players per team, called a brace. Players in a brace help each other successfully run through burrows to try and make sure they make it to the end with more moxie than their opponents.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Peli und Pelinchens Reise um die Welt
boardgame.description:
The players start at space 1 (Zoo), the first to reach space 191 wins the game. Movement is determined by a die. On some spaces events hinder or benefit the players.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Bodosan-Spiel
boardgame.description:
The players start at space 1. The first to reach space 50 wins the game. Movement is determined by a die. On some spaces events hinder or benefit the players.

—user summary

boardgame.name: The Cataclysm Handbook
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

There has always been something enticing about end-of-the-world stakes, and something even more fascinating which compels us to tell stories about what happens when the heroes lose. Why did everything fall apart, and who are the survivors that somehow endured the end of the world?

The Cataclysm Handbook is filled with options for apocalyptic and post-apocalyptic games, with magic that could destroy entire worlds or rebuild them. Horrifying new abilities serve as the bases for villainous or antiheroic characters, for how long can heroism last when civilization lies in ruin? Regardless of how grim or optimistic you wish to be in your world, I hope that you enjoy the myriad of options provided for such ruinous adventures.

For use with Pathfinder 1st edition and the Spheres of Power and Spheres of Might systems.

boardgame.name: Adventures of Chris
boardgame.description: Adventures of Chris is a story-driven, character-rich, cartoon adventure

boardgame.name: Out of Place
boardgame.description: Out of Place deals with a serious theme telling the adventure of a teenage protagonist and his machine companion.

boardgame.name: Blade Assault
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still in active development and available to the public for purchase in it's unfinished state, either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between).





Blade Assault is a 2D action rogue-lite platformer with beautiful pixel art set in a desolate sci-fi world. Fight against the corrupt military of Esperanza as part of the resistance force of the Undercity. Bring the corrupt to justice by becoming stronger and fighting alongside your trusty comrades.After the devastating Red Stone War, the world is divided into three regions: the mutant infested outside grounds, the Undercity where people have fled to seek refuge from mutants, and the sky city Esperanza where the rich and powerful rule over the world. Fight against the corrupt military of Esperanza as part of the resistance force of the Undercity. Bring the corrupt to justice by becoming stronger and fighting alongside your trusty comrades.

Blade Assault is a 2D action rogue-lite platformer with beautiful pixel art set in a desolate sci-fi world. The game features tight, responsive controls and a cast of charming characters. Playable characters have various transformable weapons that they use to battle against their enemies. Weapons can be further customized by different “Cores” and “Transform Upgrades” that appear randomly during gameplay.

Satisfying fast-paced combat. Utilizing diverse skills, dodging enemy attacks by dashing, launching projectiles, slashing away mobs of enemies. Your attacks change according to the “Cores” you select and the upgrades you decide to take on your runs.

Meet NPCs and find upgrades along your quest to unlock unique powers. Each playable character has their own weapons of choice kept in their own armory.

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: Tamarin
boardgame.description: Leap into action and discover nature in Tamarin, a third-person action-adventure game set in beautiful Nordic scenery, starring the world's cutest monkey. Pollution and destruction from ever-expanding insects sets the agile monkey into a fight for his family's survival.

boardgame.name: City of Gangsters
boardgame.description:
The year is 1920, the start of Prohibition in the USA. With congressional action, a huge segment of the national economy becomes illegal overnight: bars and saloons are ordered to close, distilleries and breweries go quiet, distributors shut down. But a new era is dawning: a gilded age for smugglers, black markets, illegal manufacture, and organized crime.

This is where you come in. You’re a new arrival in the city at the dawn of Prohibition, with ambitions of striking it big. Behind many of the city’s facades, people are building makeshift distilleries, secret loading docks, nighttime speakeasies. Work your way into this network, and the world will be yours.

boardgame.description: film noir

boardgame.name: GRIME
boardgame.description: GRIME is a fast and unforgiving Action-Adventure RPG

boardgame.name: Wonder Boy: Asha in Monster World
boardgame.description: sequel

boardgame.name: Player Characters I
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Systematic Guides #01: Player Characters I is a collection of revised articles originally published in Savage Insider #10 and Savage Insider Deluxe #01. The articles are seemingly disconnected but can effectively be rolled into the category of options, mechanics, and inspiration for creating player characters, non-player characters, and using those to create encounters and adventures. Some of them even contain NPCs the GM can use to throw directly into a game. This collection of article includes new character backgrounds, archetype inspiration, and magic weapons.

Player Characters I includes seven magazine-style articles providing a variety of content for creating and using characters:

Dhampir - half-human, half-vampire character background
Lokka - shapeshifting xeno character background
Cataphract - frontline break character concept
Engineer - tinkering character concept
Hierophant - culti-leading divine spellcasting character concept
Ranger - fantasy-staple character concept
Magic Weapons - three amazing weapons for your fantasy games

boardgame.description: Aeon Drive is a speedrun action platformer set in Cyberpunk Barcelona.

boardgame.description: F.I.S.T.: Forged In Shadow Torch is a Metroidvania action game featuring exploration, intense combat and challenging platforming.

boardgame.name: The Signifier
boardgame.description: The Signifier is a story-driven tech-noir mystery adventure. Explore the real world and enter the unconscious realms of the victim's mind. Use technology to find clues to solve puzzles, unravel layers of dialogue, and find the truth.
boardgame.videogamehonor: 2021 A MAZE. Awards Long Feature Award Nominee

boardgame.name: Death of Rose
boardgame.description: Death of Rose is the first chapter of a unique experience that introduces Beth and Scott to a chilling adventure in a mysterious abandoned high school.

boardgame.name: Warriors: Rise to Glory!
boardgame.description: Warriors: Rise to Glory! is a turn-based combat game with RPG elements. Fight epic battles in the arena to become the mightiest warrior and find freedom and revenge. Create your custom warrior, gain XP, loot to improve your stats, skills, and gear – and prepare to kick lots of asses or die trying!

boardgame.name: Remarkable Races: Shandow
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

“We are all just leaves floating upon a wild river. What we have been blessed with are glimpses of the safest current.”
— Hira-Solones, High Seer

Nestled along the foothills of the Arinast mountains, the Shandow lead lives of tranquility, meditation, and prophecy. Although they may not have the presence in the realms that races with greater numbers have had, from the shadow of the mountains they have developed philosophies and given prophecies that have changed the direction of the continent.

This supplement includes:

Stats for the playable race, the Shandow.
Details about their culture and the creation myth of their people.
Lore and trivia for you to use when roleplaying your Shandow character.

boardgame.name: Bloody Countess Dungeon
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Bloody Countess Dungeon is a dungeon written entirely in one page. It can be played with any generic RPG system and you are going to need a player to be the Storyteller (Game Master a.k.a GM) and 3 to 5 players to take the roles of the Playable Characters (PC).

Context: Set by the end of the XV century, a vampire countess keeps her preys alive at her personal dungeon, so she can always have some fresh blood for herself. With the recurring disappearances of some folks in a village near her county, a group of heroes decides to venture into the dungeon determined to save her prisoners
